body.p: Beta features provide early access to upcoming product innovations, enabling you to test functionality and provide feedback. If you want to provide feedback for an experimental feature in Couchbase, file an issue directly in our issue tracking system ticket. See for details. For Q&A, you can use the Couchbase discussion forums.

Beta features are not fully supported under Couchbase Subscription Level Agreements, may not be functionally complete, and are not intended for production use. Because beta features are still under development, Couchbase does not guarantee the stability of such features. As a result, if you are using a beta feature, you may not be able to upgrade to subsequent releases of that feature.

The following are beta features in Couchbase Server 4.0:
Data Manipulation Language (DML) statements - INSERT, UPDATE, UPSERT, MERGE, DELETE
Prepared statements - All SDK platforms contain beta support for prepared statements.
